abilities.name: Thunderclap Zone
abilities.effect: Each of your Pokémon that has any Lightning Energy attached to it has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Plasma Fists
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Full Voltage-GX
attacks.effect: Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
